alert.note: Alert for Barrow; DeKalb; Gwinnett; Hall; North Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Barrow, northwestern DeKalb, south central Forsyth, Gwinnett, southwestern Hall and east central Fulton Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1216 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Sugar Hill, or 8 miles southeast of Cumming, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Peachtree Corners, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Dunwoody, Duluth, Sugar Hill, Suwanee, Buford, Norcross, Doraville, Braselton, Auburn, Flowery Branch, Dacula, Oakwood, Berkeley Lake, and Carl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Barrow; DeKalb; Gwinnett; Hall; North Fulton
